channel.title: Best movie of 2010
channel.description:
I love movies. I usually see one every week. Lets talk about movies.
Post anything about movies/actors you liked
Best movie of 2010: Tron, Inception or Shutter Island.
Movies I saw in 2010: Resident Evil Iron Man 2 Predators Clash of the Titans Nightmare on Elm Street Harry Potter Alice in Wonderland The last airbender The A team Karate Kid The expendables Toy Story 3 Prince of Persia Kick-ass Shrek Robin Hood Skyline Piranah Lightning Thief Narnia The crazies Splice Legion Salt The book of Eli Paranormal Activity Scott Pilgrim Despicable Me Jackass Red The other guys Get him to the Greek Shutter Island Hot tub time machine Saw The town Megamind Brooklyn's finest Devil The last exorcism Faster Social Network Dinner for Schmucks The bounty hunter True Grit Unstoppable The Human centipede Youth in Revolt Due date The fighter Hereafter Warriors way 127 hours I love you philip morris gamer

item.title: Best movie of 2010
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

n10si t:

the fighter

Christian Bale did such an amazing job in that movie.

Or

[quote=“Thug-life, post:7, topic:374940”]Toy Story 3.

Pixar are absolute legends. Never made a bad film, and with the original Toy Story coming out around 15 years ago - many of us would always want to see how the story ended.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Best movie of 2010
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

OF: What was the name of the latest Saw movie? I believe it was Saw Six?

OT: I thought Devil was the best movie I’ve seen so far, I can’t remember some others I loved.
